This log shows two copies of the example sender EA (on EURUSD and GBPUSD) broadcasting messages to a single copy of the example receiver EA in another instance of MT4. The log was created by DbgView (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/bb896647). The figure in the second column is the time in seconds, and therefore message transmission between the sending and receiving copies of MT4 generally took less than 1 millisecond. For example, the first message was received 0.00064589 seconds after it was sent. However, please note that the timings depend on MT4's internal load and on general computer activity. For example, the message in lines 16/17 took about 3.5 milliseconds to be delivered.
